name: Futile - CD
description:
1. Shelter
2. Shallow Flood
3. Broken Smile
4. Framed
5. Futile

Witch Hunter Records
WHR011

The CD comes in a 4-panel gatefold wallet. The CD is limited to 150 copies and will also be available from belowthefall.bandcamp.com as well as iTunes, Amazon and Spotify.

FREE POSTAGE TO THE UK.

Recorded between July and October 2011 at Studio 91 with Jordan Fish and Sam Winfield
Artwork by James Giles
Photography by Matt Bargus

www.belowthefall.com
www.witchhunterrecords.com
www.facebook.com/belowthefall
belowthefall.bandcamp.com

name: Below The Fall EP - CD
description:
Our debut 2-track Limited Edition EP recorded in April 2010 at Studio 91.  Released on Witch Hunter Records.

1. Commissioner
2. Just Run Away

Only 150 copies produced and comes in a recycled brown cardboard sleeve with artwork by James Giles.
